name: Cube Rush - GMTK Game Jam 2022
description:
Cube Boy must survive! 

Match your number with the enemy number to defeat the enemy! A simple wave based game, made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move/Jump

S Key/Down Arrow - Slam

R - Restart Game

Credits:

Art & Programming - GameDevRaj

Music & Sounds Effects - Purchased by GameDevRaj
